tip.text: Don't die! Death will wipe your save, destroying all the progress you've made.
You can use any item as a weapon.
Characters with a higher speed will move faster than those with a slower one.
All skills in the game are increased through use.
Levelling a skill will allow you to increase its governing attribute more upon gaining a level.
Try right clicking or shift-clicking items in your inventory and status panels!
Trees can be chopped down with an axe or a sword, and doing so will improve your weapon skill!
